DOC.brief_summary: Study Healthy Males Compare White Blue Formulations AZD6244 .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Open Label Study Compare Current Phase II Planned Phase III Capsule Formulation AZD6244
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Single-center , Randomized , Open-label , Crossover Study Compare White ( Current Phase II ) Blue ( Planned Phase III ) Capsule Formulations AZD6244 Hyd-Sulfate Healthy Male Subjects .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 18 55 BMI 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive weigh least 50 kg 100 kg , inclusive Calculated creatinine clearance ( CRCL ) great 50 mL/min usin gthe CockcroftGault formula History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , exertion drug . Any positive result screen serum hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody , HIV .
